title: I got Lower Priority Que for Exiting my Practice Tool Game
body: can some awesome riot person, take my LPQ (lower priority Que)  off my account , because, come on  LPQ for quitting a practice tool game. a{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You shouldn't be getting a low priority queue for leaving a practice tool game. When you exit a practice tool game, you may get a message that tells you there may be penalties but this is basically a bug as no penalties apply for leaving custom or practice games.

I can't see any leaverbuster restrictions on your account. If you're certain you were penalized, are you referring to a different account?
